tool.name: MS²Rescore
tool.description: Modular and user-friendly platform for AI-assisted rescoring of peptide identifications

filelist.name: ms2rescore.psm_file
filelist.label: Select Identification file
filelist.help: Select the PSM file generated by the search engine. This file should contain all unfiltered target and decoy identifications. Multiple files can be selected.

select.name: ms2rescore.psm_file_type
select.label: Identification file type
select.help: Select the file type of the PSM file. The 'infer' option will attempt to infer the file type from the file extension.

filelist.name: spectrum_files
filelist.label: Select Identification files
filelist.help: Select the MGF, mzML, or Bruker raw file(s) containing the spectra. The file names should not contain spaces.

keyvalues.name: ms2rescore.modification_mapping
keyvalues.label: Modification mapping
keyvalues.help: Map search engine modification labels to ProForma labels (PSI-formula, or mass shift). This is required for correct modification parsing. If this field is left empty, the search engine labels will be used as is, which may lead to incorrect feature generation for modified peptides. Check out the user guide for more information.

keyvalues.name: ms2rescore.fixed_modifications
keyvalues.label: Fixed modifications (Maxquant only)
keyvalues.help: Add fixed modifications that are not included in the PSM file by the search engine. If the search engine writes fixed modifications to the PSM file (as most do), leave this field empty. However, if you are using MaxQuant, which does not write fixed modifications to the PSM file, you should add them here.

checkbox.name: ms2rescore.lower_score_is_better
checkbox.label: Lower score is better
checkbox.help: When enabled, a lower search engine score is considered to denote a better PSM.

checkbox.name: ms2rescore.rename_to_usi
checkbox.label: Rename spectrum IDs to USIs
checkbox.help: Rename the spectrum identifiers to Universal Spectrum Identifiers (USIs) for full provenance tracking.

checkbox.name: ms2rescore.write_report
checkbox.label: Generate interactive report
checkbox.help: Generate an interactive report with quality control charts about the MS²Rescore run. This report can be viewed in a web browser.

string.name: ms2rescore.id_decoy_pattern
string.label: Decoy protein regex pattern
string.help: A regular expression pattern to identify decoy PSMs by the associated protein names. Most PSM file types contain a dedicated field indicating decoy PSMs, in which case this field can be left empty.

string.name: ms2rescore.psm_id_pattern
string.label: PSM ID regex pattern
string.help: A regular expression pattern to extract the spectrum ID from the IDs in the PSM file. In most cases, this field can be left empty. Check the user guide for more information.

string.name: ms2rescore.spectrum_id_pattern
string.label: Spectrum ID regex pattern
string.help: Similar to the PSM ID regex pattern, but for the IDs in the spectrum file.

string.name: ms2rescore.processes
string.label: Number of parallel processes
string.help: Choose higher values for faster processing, and lower values for less memory usage.

number.name: ms2rescore.feature_generators.deeplc.calibration_set_size
number.label: Calibration set size (fraction or number of PSMs)

string.name: ms2rescore.feature_generators.ionmob_model
string.label: Name of built-in model or path to custom model
